pageTitle: By Malene Birger Eloosa Cover Up Maxi Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 50in / 127cm, from center back MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash. 100% tencel lyocell. Fabric: Ponte jersey. Covered elastic adds soft volume to the bodice of a striped strapless maxi dress from By Malene Birger. A slit opens the side to reveal glimpse of leg. Double-layered. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer By Malene Birger is an award-winning clothing line that trades in distinguished exclusivity and brings simple elegance to every aspect of its conceptions. Designer Malene Birger's regal creations have earned international acclaim and a royal audience: Princess Marie of Denmark has been spotted at her shows. Fashion icons Kate Moss and Claudia Schiffer also count themselves as fans of the designer's defiant luxury. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
